task.title: Creating a Project
task.shortdesc: The first step to creating a document in Acme Eye is to create a new project.

context.p: To create a project, follow these steps:

step.cmd: From the Welcome Screen use the Create New Project option, as shown in the figure below.

cmd.sub: Under Create New Project, enter the project information, as follows.
Type: Select the type of document you wish to create.
Date: Date you plan on sending the document to your customer.

taskbody.result: Acme Eye creates the project and opens it for you. The name of your project appears followed by the type of document you are creating and the document outline.
